longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid on arrival. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of emergency or temporary passports.

Visa required, except for Nationals of China (People's Rep.)
holding a normal passport and traveling as part of a tourist
group that has been organized through a Tourist Agency of
Belarus. 
Visa Issuance:
- Visitors can obtain a visa on arrival at Minsk (MSQ) if
   
Additional Information:
- All visitors are required to have health insurance which can
  be purchased on arrival in Minsk (MSQ)
